analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Revolution3.doInvest (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#625-695):
	External calls:
	- senderIsInvestor = m_investors.isInvestor(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#657-660)
	- referrerAddr.notZero() && ! senderIsInvestor && ! m_referrals[msg.sender] && referrerAddr != msg.sender && m_investors.isInvestor(referrerAddr) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#661-678)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(excess) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#653)
	- advertisingAddress.send(m_advertisingPercent.mul(receivedEther)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#655-656)
	- adminsAddress.send(m_adminsPercent.mul(receivedEther)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#656-657)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_referrals (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#664-667)

elements.expression: referrerAddr.notZero() && ! senderIsInvestor && ! m_referrals[msg.sender] && referrerAddr != msg.sender && m_investors.isInvestor(referrerAddr)

analysis.description: Address.toAddress (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#171-179) is declared view but contains assembly code

i in PrivateEntrance.provideAccessFor (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#326) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in Revolution3.doInvest (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#625-695):
	External calls:
	- senderIsInvestor = m_investors.isInvestor(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#657-660)
	- referrerAddr.notZero() && ! senderIsInvestor && ! m_referrals[msg.sender] && referrerAddr != msg.sender && m_investors.isInvestor(referrerAddr) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#661-678)
	- assert(bool)(m_investors.addInvestment(referrerAddr,refBonus)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#670-672)
	- dividends = calcDividends(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#681)
	- assert(bool)(m_investors.addInvestment(msg.sender,investment)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#686-687)
	- assert(bool)(m_investors.setPaymentTime(msg.sender,now)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#687)
	- assert(bool)(m_investors.newInvestor(msg.sender,investment,now)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#689-690)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(excess) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#653)
	- advertisingAddress.send(m_advertisingPercent.mul(receivedEther)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#655-656)
	- adminsAddress.send(m_adminsPercent.mul(receivedEther)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#656-657)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investmentsNumber (/unique_chucks/35/0xd1163d0a38d7f7675152ae030e40330be5cc3c7e.sol#694)
